sentences.en: AIM : To clone fibronectin ( FN ) promoter and identify its transcriptional activity combined with SV 40 enhancer.
sentences.cn: 目的: 克隆纤维连结蛋白 ( FN ) 启动子和检测其转录活性,并初步研究增加SV40增强子对其转录活性的影响.

sentences.en: Aim To test the enhancing activity and the mechanism of oleyl pyroglutamate used as transdermal enhancer.
sentences.cn: 目的研究焦谷氨酸油醇酯作为经皮渗透促进剂,试验其促渗活性和促渗机理.

sentences.en: Caffeine is all - natural performance - endurance enhancer for athletes.
sentences.cn: 对运动员来说,咖啡因是一种表现力和忍耐力纯天然提升剂.

sentences.en: Caffeine is the all - natural performance - endurance enhancer for athletes.
sentences.cn: 对运动员来说,咖啡因是一种纯天然的表现力和忍耐力.

sentences.en: Cinnamon is an excellent flavour enhancer.
sentences.cn: 肉桂是种绝佳的提味调料。

sentences.en: Editor's Note : The 200 - year - old boob enhancer was discovered in storage at the Science Museum in London.
sentences.cn: 有200年历史的聚拢提升文胸在伦敦科学博物馆仓库中被发现.

sentences.en: Ground construction such as cleaning waxing ! Sales: Jingang sand color flooring materials. Ground penetration enhancer.
sentences.cn: 销售: 金刚沙彩色地坪材料. 地面渗透强化剂. 磨光机及工具等!

sentences.en: Holding a pencil in your mouth is still worse as a smile enhancer.
sentences.cn: 在嘴里夹一根铅笔、以此强化笑容的方法更糟.

sentences.en: Its sodium salt is the food flavour enhancer monosodium glutamate ( MSG ).
sentences.cn: 谷氨酸钠 ( 即味精 ) 广泛用作调味品.

sentences.en: Objective To detect the polymorphism int he thymidylate synthase promoter enhancer region ( TSER ) in primary cancer.
sentences.cn: 目的检测原发性胃癌、结直肠癌胸苷酸合成酶 ( TS)启动基因增强子区段(TSER ) 的多态性.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE: Introduce the development of the eucalyptus oil as a transdermal absorption enhancer.
sentences.cn: 目的: 介绍桉叶油透皮吸收促进剂研究进展.

sentences.en: Polka dots can also work as a great figure enhancer.
sentences.cn: 带圆点的衣服同样也可以凸显你的身材哦.

sentences.en: That is, until she found LifeWave Energy Enhancer patches.
sentences.cn: 就这样, 直到我发现了莱威公司的能量增强贴片.
那是一种 所谓 的加味剂.

sentences.en: This article introduces a adaptive exercise ECG signal enhancer with manual neural network.
sentences.cn: 介绍了一种用人工神经网络预滤波的自适应运动心电信号增强器.

phrases.tran_cn: 鲜味增强剂；香味增强剂

trans.tran_en: An enhancer is a substance or a device that makes a particular thing look, taste, or feel better
